cab.content: His Britannic Majosty's Goveniment.GOFrom Viceroy, Foreign Department, 4th J-(Received at India Office 10 pan.), 4th June 1919.Clear the line.804 S. Secret. Afghanistan. Our telegram of the 2nd June, 793 8. We have omitted the words "I ask for no surrender of guns or forts" as conceivably embarrassing.Communique (? will) issue giving, resume of Amir's letter and Viceroy's reply. From former we have omitted all reference to bombardment of (corrupt group) and Habibullahls tomb.
